headline.main: Abstract Paintings That Combine French Philosophy, 3-D Software and Hieronymus Bosch

snippet: The disparate influences on Tom LaDuke’s layered works include Lacan, Manet and Disneyland’s “Haunted Mansion.”
abstract: The disparate influences on Tom LaDuke’s layered works include Lacan, Manet and Disneyland’s “Haunted Mansion.”
